usage: ontos_stub.py [-h] [--goal GOAL]
                     [--type {atom,kernel,log,product,strategy}] [--id ID]
                     [--output OUTPUT] [--depends-on DEPENDS_ON] [--quiet]

Create Level 1 stub documents.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --goal GOAL, -g GOAL  Goal description for the document
  --type {atom,kernel,log,product,strategy}, -t {atom,kernel,log,product,strategy}
                        Document type
  --id ID               Document ID (auto-generated from --output if not
                        specified)
  --output OUTPUT, -o OUTPUT
                        Output file path
  --depends-on DEPENDS_ON, -d DEPENDS_ON
                        Comma-separated list of dependency IDs
  --quiet, -q           Minimal output
